definition: canvass for contributions/to recruit/to collect/to raise
private equity fund/fund offered to private placement (e.g. hedge fund)

sentences.english: It is unclear which private-equity firms the Internet search company has talked to.
sentences.chinese: 不清楚谷歌已經同哪些私募公司談過。

sentences.english: Private-equity firms are the new kings of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 私募股本公司是資本主義的新主子。
私募資金中國地區執行總裁。

sentences.english: Lehman began pitching a deal to private-equity firms two months ago.
sentences.chinese: 兩個月前雷曼同一家私募公司展開了一樁交易。

sentences.english: Private-equity firms have been searching for companies whose share prices have been caught in the general downdraft.
sentences.chinese: 私募股權公司一直在尋找陷入股價下挫漩渦的公司。

sentences.english: But a wave of consolidation seems to be driven this year by French private equity house AXA.
sentences.chinese: 法國的私募股權公司AXA似乎引領了一股併購風潮。

sentences.english: Second, what about the argument that private equity is a superior business model?
sentences.chinese: 第二，私募股權是一個優質的商業模式這個論點如何？

sentences.english: It is to will guide illicit collect fund to be hypostatic economy service, serve for the industry.
sentences.chinese: 一是將引導私募基金爲實體經濟服務，爲產業服務。

sentences.english: Seagate has taken the private equity option before.
sentences.chinese: 希捷曾經有過向私募基金公司出售的舉動。

sentences.english: Many complain about private-equity firms keeping deal fees for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都在抱怨私募股權公司將交易費據爲己有。

sentences.english: THE private-equity industry faces a critical test.
sentences.chinese: 私募股權行業現在面臨着一個關鍵性的考驗。

sentences.english: Foreign private-equity firms have a history of running into trouble in China.
sentences.chinese: 資私募股權投資公司在中國的投資之路可謂一波三折。

sentences.english: It sounds like just the sort of trick they might have picked up from private-equity firms.
sentences.chinese: 這個聽起來像是他們從私募機構處習得的某種把戲。

sentences.english: A succession of private equity buyers came and went.
sentences.chinese: 私募股權的收購者們你來我往。

sentences.english: Blackstone has said that its private-equity portfolio fell by just 13%.
sentences.chinese: 但黑石司宣私募股資組合僅跌13%。

sentences.english: Blackstone Group, on the other hand, does not consolidate its private equity funds.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，黑石集團未將私募股權基金並表。

definition: private equity fund/fund offered to private placement (e.g. hedge fund)
to invest in stock/to buy shares
canvass for contributions/to recruit/to collect/to raise
